nav.div: Fairhaven Public Schools » Families & Students » Coronavirus Update » Nutrition

span.img: “Grab and Go” Meals during District Closure

div.h4: Elizabeth I. Hastings Middle School Main Entrance

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Each boxed “Grab and Go” meal contains (1) lunch and (1) breakfast for the next morning.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; caret-color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Meals can be picked up daily, Monday - Friday from 11:30AM - 1PM at the front entrance of Elizabeth Hastings Middle School.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; caret-color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Please be aware that social distancing practices must still be followed, please stay at least 6 feet away from others. Also, hand sanitizer will be available on site.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Contact your building principal with any questions.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Please use Ash Street to enter and School Street to exit. Park in the main parking lot (in front of the gym entrance) and walk to the front entrance of the school to pick up your boxed meal, maintaining at least 6ft. distance from each other.

strong.style: caret-color: rgb(51, 51, 51); color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.style: caret-color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: Each box will contain a sandwich, choices will vary day-to-day but may include turkey + cheese, ham + cheese or sun butter + jelly, chicken salad and tuna, along with a breakfast meal (cereal, fruit, milk, yogurt, muffins) for the following morning.

p.style: line-height: 1.2; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0pt 0px; caret-color: rgb(51, 51, 51); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial;

li.span: Families may become eligible for SNAP benefits. Here is the link to apply online:

a.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
